content: readme.md mini.css minimal, responsive, style-agnostic css frameworkmini.css is lightweight css framework (under 7kb gzipped) designed mobile devices modern browsers mind. responsiveness, ease use customization are of main features the framework, while accessibility extensive documentation are of secondary focuses the project. framework is written using sass, while of components are based flexbox.setup & usage have 4 options it comes setting mini.css: a package manager (recommended) gitcdn rawgit cdnjs (preferred older releases) instructions how use, best practices, templates other usage information, please visit framework's documentation.method 1: a package manager (recommended)install mini.css using npm, yarn bower.npm install mini.cssyarn add mini.cssbower install mini.csspick of available flavors use css file.start working your project. detailed documentation is available the framework's website, be sure check out.method 2: gitcdnmini.css is hosted gitcdn, open-source service, you easily grab latest release's distributables. simply link your preferred flavor inside html page's <head> tag:<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://gitcdn.link/repo/chalarangelo/mini.css/master/dist/{mini-flavor}.css" />remember replace {mini-flavor} the flavor's name (e.g. mini-default mini-default.min the default flavor).method 3: rawgitmini.css is hosted rawgit, another open-source service, you easily grab specific release's distributables. simply link a release your preferred flavor inside html page's <head> tag:<link rel="stylesheet" href="cdn.rawgit.com/chalarangelo/mini.css/{release-tag}/dist/{mini-flavor}.css" />remember replace {release-tag} a release the releases page {mini-flavor} the flavor's name (e.g. mini-default mini-default.min the default flavor).method 4: cdnjs (preferred older releases) you rather an older version the framework, should head to cdnjs a list releases flavor files supplied them.flavors & customizatonflavors are of key features mini.css, allowing to customize website's design make project stand . we provide with few pre-defined flavors might suit needs will help figure how use framework create websites apps it. you easily build own flavors editing flavor file customizing almost everything. more information, head to customization page build own flavor way like
